auth.signInRequired: Please sign in with your Google account to use the analysis features.
auth.tokenExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

input.title: Lab Data Input
input.hl7Placeholder:
Paste your HL7 v2.x message here...

Example:
MSH|^~\&|ANALYTICA|ANALYTICA|||20250925120306||ORU^R01|...
PID|1||12345||DOE^JOHN||19900101|M|||
OBX|1|NM|FERR^Ferritin||85|ng/ml|15-200||||F
input.pdfDrop: Drag & drop a PDF file here, or click to browse
input.noData: No data to analyze. Please paste HL7 data or upload a PDF.

report.title: Analysis Report
report.disclaimer: This report is generated by AI and is for informational purposes only. It does not replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider.

errors.parseError: Failed to parse HL7 data. Please check the format.
errors.pdfTooLarge: PDF file is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.
errors.invalidPdf: Please select a valid PDF file.
